text: We didn't meet Joe in person during our stay because he was out of town, but he still was the perfect host helping us out when needed. He arranged we could borrow an ironing board from a neighbor and made sure a bike we lent from him was fixed at a nearby bike shop. Did I mention his apartment is a delight to stay at? Clean, spacious and tastefully decorated. Oh, and downtown is only a 15 minutes bike ride away. The only downside is that if u need all three bedrooms, you have to enter and exit the house through the 3rd bedroom. So don't put the lazy person in there...
title: Contemporary Austin Townhome
